description.value:
Every good performer needs an accompanying act. Nominate yourself and an ally within 10 feet. Stride or Step, then your ally can Stride or Step as a reaction as long as they end the same distance or closer to you than they started.

Lead by Example If you used two actions, you and your selected ally count any enemies that you both threaten as being flanked, regardless of your relative positions, until the start of your next turn. Your ally becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed] against ranged Strikes made by creatures within 10 feet until the start of your next turn or the ally moves, whichever comes first.
